name: Cantaloupe
description:
Cantaloupe is a very simple game and very easy to play. You can use random fruits to synthesize the same kind to get bigger fruits, such as blueberries, figs, kiwis, plums, yellow peaches, oranges, pomegranates, avocados, papaya, pineapple, coconuts, etc. Each kind of fruit grade size rises in turn, until finally synthesizes the cantaloupe! The game ends when the screen is filled with fruit, and the goal is to synthesize cantaloupes to get a higher score!

This game will make you relaxed and happy. The little fruits just want to be big cantaloupes!

This is a luck game as well as an intelligence game. Both luck and intelligence will make you to be the final winner. Start the game journey immediately!
